sections.heading: Conjunctive, disjunctive, or bothUnless the context clearly indicates otherwise:(1) The word "and" indicates the conjunctive;(2) The word "or" indicates the disjunctive; and(3) When the article is phrased in the disjunctive, followed by the words "or both", both the conjunctive and disjunctive are i
sections.text: Conjunctive, disjunctive, or bothUnless the context clearly indicates otherwise:(1) The word "and" indicates the conjunctive;(2) The word "or" indicates the disjunctive; and(3) When the article is phrased in the disjunctive, followed by the words "or both", both the conjunctive and disjunctive are intended.
